abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: License: CC0 1.0 or CC-BY 4.0 or CC-BY-NC 4.0 MediaType: Image TaxonKey: Amphiprion Bloch & Schneider, 1801 The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Queensland Museum provider for OZCAM 1 records from Lizard Island Research Station 1 records from Questagame weekly feed 1 records from Museums Victoria provider for OZCAM 1 records from CAS Ichthyology (ICH) 2 records from ALA species sightings and OzAtlas 2 records from The fishes collection (IC) of the Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 3 records from The Pisces Collection at the Staatssammlung für Anthropologie und Paläoanatomie München 4 records from Colección de referencia de otolitos, Instituto de Ciencias del Mar-CSIC 6 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 10 records from KUBI Ichthyology Collection 11 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Fish Collection 13 records from KUBI Ichthyology Tissue Collection 14 records from Australian Museum provider for OZCAM 17 records from University of California Museum of Paleontology 57 records from Occurrence records of southern African aquatic biodiversity 79 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records 142 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 798 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
